text: To Him belongs all grandeur in the heavens and the earth�He said:Exaltedness (ʿuluww), omnipotence (qudra), majesty (ʿaẓama), power and strength (ḥawl wa quwwa) belong to Him in the entire dominion of creation (mulk). He will support with His power and strength whoever seeks His protection, whilst He will consign whoever relies on himself to his own care. But God, Glorified and Exalted is He, knows best.His words, Exalted is He:
